mapper.insert: insert into member values ( #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userRnn}, #{userName}, #{userGender}, #{userEmail}, #{phone}, #{zipcode}, #{address}, #{detailAddress}, default, default, default, default )
mapper.select: select user_id, user_pw, substr(user_rnn,1,8)||'******' as user_rnn, user_gender, user_name, user_email, phone, zipcode, address, detailaddress, user_type, user_status, user_control, user_regdate from member where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: update member set user_id = #{userId}, user_pw =#{userPw}, user_name =#{userName}, user_rnn =#{userRnn}, phone = #{phone}, user_email = #{userEmail}, zipcode = #{zipcode}, address = #{address}, detailAddress = #{detailAddress}, where user_id = #{userId}
